getEndpoint().details: This function allows users to view the current endpoint of the distributor.

returns._0: The current endpoint of the distributor.

getManager().details: This function allows users to view the current manager of the distributor.

returns._0: The address of the current manager of the distributor.

params.currency: The address of the currency to check.

returns._0: bool True if the currency is supported, false otherwise.

params.token: The token to set the fees.

returns._0: address[] An array of addresses representing the supported currencies.

updateEndpoint(string).details: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.
The amount of tokens to withdraw.
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to withdraw or address(0) to withdraw native tokens.

getEndpoint().notice: Retrieves the endpoint of the distributor.

getManager().notice: Retrieves the manager of the distributor.

isCurrencySupported(address).notice: Checks if a given currency is supported.

setFees(uint256).notice: Sets a new treasury fee.Only the owner can call this function.

setFees(uint256,address).notice: Sets a new treasury fee.Only the owner can call this function.

supportedCurrencies().notice: Returns a list of all supported currencies.

updateEndpoint(string).notice: Updates the endpoint of the current distributor.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws tokens from the contract to the owner's address.This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws tokens from the contract to the owner's address.This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.
